## Resources.IResourceManagerCloneOptions interface

Options for ResourceManagerBuilder clone operations. Extends IDeclarationOptions to include support for applying edits when cloning.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IResourceManagerCloneOptions extends IResourceDeclarationOptions 
```
**Extends:** [IResourceDeclarationOptions](./ts-res.resources.iresourcedeclarationoptions.md)

</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Optional array of loose condition declarations to be applied as edits during the clone operation. These conditions can modify or extend the resource candidates in the cloned manager.
